DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Single Repeated Dose Roflumilast 500 µg , Healthy Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Main Healthy male female ( 24 male 8 female ) subject Chinese ethnic origin , age 40 year old . Assessed healthy base screen examination include medical history , physical examination , blood pressure , pulse rate , ECG assessment , clinical laboratory result . Body weight accord Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19 28 kg/ [ m² ] , ( inclusive ) body weight ≥ 50 kg . Females childbearing potential use medically acceptable reliable method contraception entire study duration , tubal ligation , hysterectomy , intrauterine device without hormone postmenopausal female , latter define female menstrual period least 2 year . Main History current evidence clinically relevant allergy idiosyncrasy drug food History allergic reaction roflumilast inactive ingredient trial medication History current evidence clinically relevant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , hematological , endocrinological , metabolic , neurological , psychiatric , disease ( within last 2 year ) History malignancy within past 5 year Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) abnormalities clinical relevance ( e.g . QTc accord Bazett 's formula : QTc > 450 msec ( male ) , QTc > 470 msec ( female ) , PQ ≥ 220 msec ) Blood pressure ≥ 140 mm HG systolic ≥ 90 mm HG diastolic Elevated transaminases > 2 x upper Limit normal range increase total bilirubin > 1.5 upper Limit normal range Clinically relevant abnormality clinical chemical , hematological laboratory variable Chronic clinically relevant acute infection Proneness orthostatic dysregulation , faintings , blackout Positive result virology test acute chronic infectious HIV hepatitis A , B , C virus infection Positive drug screen Abuse alcohol drug Positive βHCG pregnancy test ( female ) Pregnant lactating female
